授業目的: This course introduces students to advanced research on Japan-China relations.
到達目標: After taking this course, students will gain an understanding of international advanced research on Japan-China relations.
授業方法: Class discussion, weekly essay. Zoom lessons for students who have received special permission.

トピック.授業計画1: To be determined in consultation with students.
トピック.授業外学習2: To be determined in consultation with students.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: 定期試験に代わるリポート／Term paper to replace the final examination (02)

開講キャンパス: 西宮上ケ原キャンパス／Nishinomiya Uegahara Campus
管理部署: 国際学研究科前期／Graduate School of International Studies Master's Course
担当者: ツー　ティモシー（TSU TIMOTHY YUN HUI）
